perks.name: Double Tap 2
perks.effect: Increases the rate of fire but also shoots two bullets for every one round, essentially doubling damage output.

perks.name: Speed Cola
perks.effect: Increases reload speed by 50 percent and massively increases the speed at which players can rebuild barriers.

perks.name: Stamina Up
perks.effect: Increases Sprint Endurance and Sprint Speed. Stamina also regenerates faster.

perks.name: PHD Flopper
perks.effect: Gives complete immunity to all explosive and falling damage, and dolphin diving now makes an explosion.

perks.name: Deadshot
perks.effect: Removes scope sway as well as reduces recoil and increases hip-fire accuracy. Additionally, this Perk will 'snap' the auto-aim sight to the Zombie's critical areas when ADS'ing rather than their torso.

perks.name: Mule Kick
perks.effect: Allows an additional weapon to be carried, for a total of three. The most recently purchased weapon will be lost when downed.

perks.name: Tombstone
perks.effect: Players that die can run back to the same spot to recover all perks and weapons. A limited time until the power-up is lost.

perks.name: Who's Who
perks.effect: When downed, players spawn nearby as a 'doppelganger' and must go and revive their bodies to come back up with everything but the Who's Who Perk.

perks.name: Electric Cherry
perks.effect: Reloading surrounds the player with an electric effect, damaging nearby Zombies and briefly stunning them. Damage and radius are increased the lower the magazine is when reloading.

perks.name: Vulture Aid
perks.effect: See stuff through walls, green gas, find ammo on ground
